body:
Comment 2: 
The spec should make clear that while it is permissible
for pointers to distinct 0-sized objects to compare equal,
it is also permissible for them to compare unequal.
No guarantee is made.

For example,

x := make([]struct{}, 10)
y := make([]struct{}, 10)

&x[0] == &y[1]?  Maybe.

Russ
